entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming south 20 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Friday 12 May 2023
